definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Although born Bahai, he used to work as a reciter of the Quran.
sentences.chinese: 虽然出生巴哈，他利用工作作为古兰经朗诵家。

sentences.english: Saeed read verses from the Qur'an to her.
sentences.chinese: 赛义德为她读古兰经的经文。

sentences.english: I had never in my life heard of The Holy Qur'an.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从来没有听说过尊贵的《古兰经》。

sentences.english: The Golden Mean Miracle is in the Mecca Verse of the Koran.
sentences.chinese: 黄金分割的奇迹也存在于古兰经中关于麦加的章节里。

sentences.english: MobileReciter is a Quran Reciter for mobile phones.
sentences.chinese: 移动朗诵者是一个移动电话古兰经吟诵。

sentences.english: This contrast between the two periods is clearly noticeable in the Quranic discourse.
sentences.chinese: 两个时期之间的差别在古兰经中的讲述是十分清楚的。

sentences.english: We have made the Koran easy to remember, is there any that will remember!
sentences.chinese: 我确已使《古兰经》易于记诵，有接受劝告的人吗？

sentences.english: Takin elder advice, read the Bible, the Koran.
sentences.chinese: 听取古人的建议，读圣经，古兰经。

sentences.english: There are more than 77,000 words in the Koran.
sentences.chinese: 整本《古兰经》所包含的词汇量超过了77000个。

sentences.english: The above four color for pan-arab colors, white seven horns stars symbolize the Koran.
sentences.chinese: 以上四种颜色为泛阿拉伯色，白色七角星象征古兰经。

sentences.english: We fast also to honor the Revelation of the Qur'an in this blessed month.
sentences.chinese: 我们斋戒同样尊重在这个吉庆月份中古兰经的降世。

sentences.english: The Shariah is the law of Islam as given in the Quran and the example of the Prophet himself.
sentences.chinese: 沙里亚是伊斯兰律法，即古兰经和先知的圣训。

sentences.english: He started memorizing the Quran again.
sentences.chinese: 他再次开始默记古兰经。

sentences.english: And so we may expect its verses to appeal to people of all times.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们认为古兰经文对任何时代的人都具有吸引力。

sentences.english: Dawood is a Koranic scholar from Cairo.
sentences.chinese: 达伍是来自开罗的《古兰经》的学者。

sentences.english: The Qur'an and its explanations are very deep in meaning.
sentences.chinese: 古兰经及她的解释是非常深奥的。

definition: the Pentateuch/the five books of Moses in the Old Testament
